title: The Picture of a Cop Falling at Rajnath Singh’s Feet Is Fake
subtitle: The picture that was shared on Twitter, is a morphed photo of a 2011 movie, called Kya Yeh Sach Hai
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
Shortly after it was revealed that the photo was fake, Sanjay Jha deleted his retweet.

Noted. I will delete my RT. @alamgirizvi you should delete this forthwith. It is inappropriate and wrong, and therefore misleading. https://t.co/vvaNqUmfzg — Sanjay Jha (@JhaSanjay) November 1, 2017
